fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
*Game On* — During the day, challenge another player. The next time they and the host are both present, the host will ping them in their private channel. Once they send a message, the host will, if or when they're both still online, the host will tell them they have 120 seconds to complete the following challenge:
> - Unscramble at least three of the names of five random roles that have each had the characters in their names rearranged randomly.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: *Prize!* — If a challenged played successfully completes your challenge, they may gain one use of any ability of the role whose name they unscrambled first.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have two people win your challenges.
